actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 114 of title 18 of the United States Code to make the killing, assaulting, or intimidating of any officer or employee of the Federal Communications Commission performing investigative, inspection, or law enforcement functions a Federal criminal offense.

summary.text: Makes it a Federal criminal offense to kill any officer or employee of the Federal Communications Commission engaged in the performance of official duties.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 114 of title 18 of the United States Code to make the killing, assaulting, or intimidating of any officer or employee of the Federal Communications Commission performing investigative, inspection, or law enforcement functions a Federal criminal offense.
